invocations.description: Fills the drawn shapes with color color.
invocations.exDescription: Draws a circle with diameter 40px. It will be filled with a 'light grey' color.

invocations.description: Fills the drawn shapes with image imagename (ex: image.png) located in the /images/ folder.
invocations.exDescription: Will draw a 60x60 rectangle filled with the image 'mypicture.png'.

invocations.description: Fills the drawn shapes with minimap data starting at startx, starty and transparency level transparency (255 is fully transparent). The zoom parameter may be specified to draw the minimap closer or further, a zoom value of 1.0 will make it draw 1 SQM/pixel, value of 0.5 will make it draw 2 SQMs/pixel, and so on.
invocations.exDescription: Will draw a 100x100 semi-transparent rectangle filled with the minimap data from your current position offset'ed by 50 SQMs to the left and 50 SQMs to the top.

invocations.description: Fills the drawn shapes with a linear gradient. spreadtype can be 0 (PadSpread), 1 (ReflectSpread) or 2 (RepeatSpread).
invocations.exDescription: Draws a 100x100 rectangle using gradients drawn diagonally, the colors will go from a 'light pink' to 'red'.

invocations.description: Fills the drawn shapes with a radial gradient.
Fills the drawn shapes with a conical gradient.
